divs: Sighting Detailsmoon became differnt colors with outer right part with red orange beam likemoon wobled, then it fell star beside it also left then returned then disapered, i belive it was a fake mmon 2 other people witnes .earlier that night there was a odd star it kept turning colors,so me and the family decided to drive to general dynamics, there have lots of strange stuff there, it a government place, it supposed to be closed we came homme my son shannon going across street started yelling i see a beam shooting out of the moon. i thought it was a sign from god
